post.date: Posted: Wed Nov 16, 2005 7:38 pm Post subject: read only object
post.author: port66
post.body:
anyone know how to remove this. make a model. and use it in q4. when you load it back up in lightwave. its readonly and cant be modified. and i cant find the option to remove it. it took me months to find invert was flip
_________________
d3/q4 mods of mine

post.date: Posted: Thu Nov 24, 2005 3:49 pm Post subject:
post.author: oDDity
post.body:
Just right click on it, go to properties, and uncheck 'read only', or just save it out as a new object.
_________________

post.body:
